Package com.xebisco.yield

Klasse DrawInstruction

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.DrawInstruction
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Cloneable
public class DrawInstruction extends Object implements Cloneable
It's a data structure that holds all the information needed to draw a rectangle, oval, text, line, or image
